text: Altar Alfonse "Al" Greene (November 9, 1954 - February 18, 2014) was an American baseball outfielder. He played in the Major League Baseball (MLB) for Detroit Tigers during 1979. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Greene died on February 18, 2014 in his hometown of Detroit, Michigan. He was aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:African-American basketball players Category:Detroit Tigers players
title: Al Greene
